comment: Lutyens Media is supporting violence , trying to create a victimhood narrative for the rioters and radical anarchists They are dishonest , biased , and untrustworthy These violent events have exposed them for what they are : very reason citizens have lost trust in them ! Shame !

                                    :ARG0-of (r / riot-01))
                              :op2 (a2 / anarchist
                                    :ARG1-of (r2 / radical-02))))))
      :snt3 (e / expose-01
            :ARG0 (e2 / event
                  :mod (v3 / violent)
                  :mod (t2 / this))
            :ARG1 (a3 / and
                  :op1 (h / honest-01
                        :polarity -
                        :ARG1 a3)
                  :op2 (b / bias-01
                        :polarity -
                        :ARG1 a3)
                  :op3 (w / worth-02
                        :polarity -
                        :ARG1 a3))
            :ARG0-of (c2 / cause-01
                  :ARG1 (l / lose-02
                        :ARG0 (c3 / citizen)
                        :ARG1 (t3 / trust-02
                              :ARG0 c3
                              :ARG1 a3)
                        :mod (v4 / very))))
      :snt4 (s2 / shame-02
            :mode expressive))
